comment.author: 86047400@N07
comment._content:
The lower-level photo features the St. John's Anglican Cathedral built in 1848. The photographer was likely occupying the viewing stand in the Antigua Recreation Grounds, looking westward. The eastern view of the Cathedral is pictured.
Ambassador Lionel Hurst (ret)
MaxHurst@aol.com

comment.author: 87331305@N08
comment._content: Its quite possible that this is the water tank in the back yard of the police station in Str Johns.

comment.author: 87355012@N06
comment._content: I believe the lower photo was taken from Government House Yard hence you can see the roof of the building on Cross Street that's burnt out.
